carl: 'Dear Paul, I made you breakfast. Love, Carl.'
I worked really hard on the smiley face. Very cheerful!
paul: A note... covered in something red.
'Dear Paul, I made you breakfast. Love, Carl.'
Why is there a smiley face drawn in... no. No no no.

carl: Oh! My art supply room key!
I've been working on a very special project down there.
You should come see! It's my best work yet.
paul: Do I even want to know what's down there?

carl: Oh, the kitchen! I was doing some... redecorating.
Do you like the new color scheme? Very avant-garde!
paul: CARL! Why is there blood on the ceiling?!
And the walls. And the... is that a handprint?
